Эта новая платформа предназначена для иг: This new platform is designed for players looking to sell their skins from games like Counter-Strike and DOTA, and receive real money in return. Selling skins through Namemarket ensures transaction safety and offers a variety of popular payment methods, from which each user can choose the most convenient. Our platform stands out with the best service and the ability to quickly convert skins from CS:GO into real money. If you have skins you want to sell, Namemarket is a great place for that. To start trading, you only need skins and a Steam account.
Шаг 1 Войдите в систему через свою учетн:
Step 1: Log in through your Steam account. Click the yellow button in the top right corner of the screen 'Sign in through steam'. Authorize in Steam by clicking 'sign in'.

Step 2: Add your trade link. You can get it by going to your profile and clicking on the 'Where to get?' button.

Step 3: Choose the skins you want to sell. This is a very quick and easy step, select items available for sale note that these items should be without a trade hold, which usually lasts up to 7 days.

Step 4: Enter your payment details. Name.market offers a wide selection of payment methods, including Bank cards, Usdt, Bitcoin, Tron, Qiwi, SBP. Choose your preferred payment method, click on it, and enter the required information. After that, you're ready for the next step.

Step 5: Accept the incoming trade from our bot. As soon as you complete all the preceding steps, you should confirm the transaction by clicking 'Accept'. This will require accepting the trade in Steam Guard.

Step 6: Receive your funds. After completing all the previous steps, you will need to wait some time to receive the transfer. Usually, this happens within 10 minutes, but sometimes the transaction can take up to 24 hours. Once the transaction is completed, you will be able to receive the money.
Стоимость предметов на нашем сайте: The price of items on our site is calculated based on various criteria, including demand on the Steam Marketplace, as well as the quality and unique features of the item. We use data from several databases to provide the most objective evaluation of your item. Mostly, we take -30% from the Steam marketplace, if you want to sell a unique item with high value in the gaming community, write to our tech support.
От чего зависит цена: What does the price depend on?
Комиссия за каждый способ платежа опреде: The commission for each payment method is determined separately, taking into account bank commissions and the current exchange rate. You can easily choose different items and, by touching the icons of payment systems, instantly find out about current and acting commissions.
Какая комиссия за продажу предметов: What is the commission for selling items?
